name: Ultrasonic Eel
description:
You control a super-fast eel and must grow the size of your eel by collecting items, all while avoiding obstacles in your path. As the size of your eel grows, you gain more points, but the eel becomes more unstable and harder to control. The game speeds up over time, so try to score as many points as you can before things become too hectic!

Use the arrow keys to move up and down.

This game was made by Luke Dummott for the NOKIA 3310 JAM 4.

- Made in Unity

- Artwork made using GIMP

- Audio made using Renoise and a custom Nokia 3310 midi instrument that I created myself, which is included in the download folder if you'd like to use it
